alignments_reset:
Changes have been detected in your project which have invalidated some of your alignments.
These verses display an icon of a broken chain next to the reference in the side menu.
alignments_corrupt: The alignments for this chapter could not be loaded and have been reset.
map_instructions:
Drag the words from the word bank on the left to the correct source on the right.

Words suggested by ${word_map} have a green bar.
To confirm the suggestion, click on the suggested word. To reset the suggestion click on the ${icon} or drag the word to the correct spot.

pane.missing_verse_warning: [WARNING: This Bible version does not include text for this reference.]
pane.title: Step 1. Read
pane.expand_hover: Click to show expanded resource panes
